enb_long_title: Eleventh session of the Conference of the Parties to the Climate Change Convention and first meeting of the Parties to the Kyoto Protocol
section_title: Special Report on Carbon Dioxide Capture and Storage
sentences: Bert Metz, Co-Chair of IPCC Working Group III (mitigation), outlined the IPCC`s special report on carbon dioxide capture and storage, including additional energy requirements, risks, leakage, and legal and regulatory issues.
Many delegates stressed the relevance of carbon dioxide capture and storage as a mitigation tool.
The EU invited SBSTA to consider a workshop on the report.
